!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui.intro 4 0 Apr 07, 2004 07:57:16.32
!MESSAGE Could not find a valid configuration for Intro Part: 
Plugin:org.eclipse.platform  Extension:org.eclipse.ui.intro  element:intro  
id:org.eclipse.platform.intro
Check Log View for details.

Mazen, looks like you didn't add content files to build.properties 
(bin.includes) so it was not picked up by the build.

What is the workaround for this?  You might want to post it in the mailing 
lists.

Debbie,
the workaround is to completely bypass intro by commenting out the following 
ni the org.eclipse.platform plugin.xml:

<extension
         point="org.eclipse.ui.intro">
      <intro
            name="%introPart.title"
            
class="org.eclipse.ui.intro.internal.presentations.CustomizableIntroPart"
            id="org.eclipse.platform.intro">
      </intro>
      <introProductBinding
            introId="org.eclipse.platform.intro"
            productId="org.eclipse.platform">
      </introProductBinding>
   </extension>

The intro content files did not make it into that integratiuon build because 
the build.properties files where not updated.

apologies for the inconvenienvce.
THis should be fixed in the latest intergartion build.
